11.name: Narration
11.text:
Sol noticed unusual sounds and voices coming from
a room at the inn, so she approached the door out
of curiosity.

12.name: Narration
12.text:
The door was slightly ajar, allowing a glimpse
into the room. Unable to resist her curiosity, Sol
peered through the gap.

14.name: Narration
14.text:
The dimly lit room of the cheap inn was faintly
illuminated by the moonlight. And within it, there
were two intertwined shadows writhing together.

15.name: Narration
15.text:
The sound of dripping fluids, the collision of
flesh, and the sorrowful sighs leaking out were
filling the room.

17.name: Isk
17.text:
"Ahh... ngh... adventurer, sama... ah... How
about... my body...?"

18.name: Man
18.text: "Ku, a, a, it feels good...! Isk-sama...!!"

19.name: Isk
19.text:
"I, too, feel very... comfortable... Filled up by
the adventurer-sama... deep inside..."

20.name: Isk
20.text: "Ku, uun...! Ha, u... a, a, a... a, aa..."

22.name: Sol
22.text:
(Eh...!? That's... could it be... th-they're
mating...!?)

24.name: Narration
24.text:
Sol is shocked by the scene she peeks at through
the gap in the door. That beautiful silver dragon
is entwined with a human, indulging in intimacy.

25.name: Narration
25.text:
Although her expression remained unchanged from
usual, the sight of her flushed cheeks and sweat
streaming down appeared incredibly lewd.

26.name: Narration
26.text:
Unaware of Sol's astonishment, the two entwine
passionately in their excitement.

28.name: Isk
28.text:
"Ah, ah...! It's good, it's good...! I feel... so
good... Ah, nnghh...!!"

30.name: Narration
30.text:
Bathed in the moonlight, Isk's ample bosom bounces
freely as she writhes her sweat-drenched body,
indulging in pleasure.

31.name: Narration
31.text:
The man also distorts his expression in pleasure,
grabbing Isk's hand and not letting go. The love
juices from Isk and the man's restraint fluid mix
at their connection, dripping and wetting the bed
sheets.

33.name: Isk
33.text: "Amazing, a, ugh, nn, nnn...! Hiu, u, ugh...!"

34.name: Isk
34.text:
"I, I'm already... I'm... going to... cum...! Ah,
aah, I'm coming, I'm... aaahhhhh...!!"

36.name: Isk
36.text:
"Please release it inside me... all of it...
please release everything inside me!!"

42.name: Narration
42.text:
Unable to bear it, Sol averted her eyes and fled
from the scene. It was a great shock for her to
witness the passionate affair between a man and a
woman, especially when they were familiar faces.
She was deeply shaken.

44.name: Sol
44.text:
(Th-those two... were... together...!? Ohhh...
I've opened the door to an unknown world...)

46.name: Narration
46.text:
Sol blushed and tried to calm her heart, but the
heat at the core of her body did not easily
subside.

47.name: Narration
47.text:
Unbeknownst to Sol, at the back of the room
illuminated by moonlight, the two were entwined
sweetly multiple times.
